entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
